/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/:
The image captures a bustling city street, bathed in the soft glow of daylight. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a vibrant backdrop to the urban landscape below. Tall buildings, their facades a mix of white and beige, rise majestically on either side of the street, their windows reflecting the world around them. 

The street itself is a hive of activity. Cars, painted in shades of white and silver, are scattered across the road, some moving while others are stationary, perhaps waiting for their turn to join the flow of traffic. A bus, its red and white colors standing out against the cityscape, is captured mid-journey, adding a dynamic element to the scene.

On the right side of the street, a line of trees stands tall, their green leaves providing a touch of nature amidst the concrete jungle. Their presence softens the harsh lines of the buildings and adds a sense of tranquility to the otherwise busy scene.

The image is taken from a low angle, looking up at the buildings. This perspective gives a sense of scale and grandeur to the buildings, making them appear even more imposing. The sun shines brightly in the top left corner of the image, casting long shadows and bathing the scene in a warm, inviting light.
